summary: This is an email chain from November 14, 2021, where an anonymous individual contacts the FBI, identifying themselves as a lifelong model and victim of Ghislaine Maxwell, Jeffrey Epstein, and Jean Luc Brunel. The individual offers information about Maxwell and emphasizes Brunel's significant role in international sex trafficking.

persons.name: Special Agent - FBI New York Field Office
persons.context: The recipient of the forwarded email chain, indicating the information is being passed to the FBI for review.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Identified by the anonymous writer as a perpetrator from whom the writer was a victim, though described as less culpable than Jean Luc Brunel.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Referenced in the context of the writer being a victim of 'them' (Epstein and Maxwell).

persons.name: Jean Luc Brunel
persons.context: Identified by the anonymous writer as Epstein's partner, the writer's former agent, and described as a far worse international sex trafficker than Maxwell over 40 years.

connections.description: Referenced together as 'them' by the victim, indicating their joint involvement in the alleged abuse.
Described by the victim as 'Epstein's partner' in the context of trafficking.
The writer states Brunel was their modeling agent and that they were a victim of his trafficking operations.
The writer identifies themselves as a victim of Maxwell.

events.title: Victim Outreach to FBI
events.description: An anonymous individual, identifying as a lifelong model and victim of Maxwell, Epstein, and Brunel, sends an email to the FBI offering information.
personsInvolved: Special Agent - FBI New York Field Office

keyFacts: An anonymous lifelong model and former teen runaway identifies as a victim of Ghislaine Maxwell, Jeffrey Epstein, and Jean Luc Brunel.
The victim claims Jean Luc Brunel, described as Epstein's partner and their former modeling agent, was '100x worse than Maxwell' and a major international sex trafficker for 40 years.
The victim states they have met 'them all,' been at parties with them, and offers to provide more information about Maxwell to the FBI.
This correspondence demonstrates ongoing victim outreach to law enforcement regarding the Epstein/Maxwell network even after their prosecutions.
